name: Bone Hop
description:
You suddenly awake in a dungeon, you're a head!! Go hop to your body.

(Hold spacebar and release to hop, the longer you hold the further you hop. You jump where you look, you can change direction in air with your mouse movements.)

(keep in mind, this game was not developed for laptops. If you plan to run this on a non-gaming laptop be advised that it will be a far diminished experience, and level 5 might not actually be possible for you. Even after the update that introduced quality settings, there isn't much I can do to make the game run better on laptops)
